comment._content: It feels weird looking at photos outside NSW on this photostream! This is King William Street, looking south from near Hindley Street. The Glenelg Tram still operates. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glenelg_Tram Google Maps Street View - g.co/maps/dy46y
